subject: RE: [junit] Choosing A Right Class.
msgSnippet: WE should write test for every class and moreover for every method that we create. If you are refering to Integration tests then we should choose all those
messageBody:
WE should write test for every class and moreover for every method that we
create. If you are refering to Integration tests then we should choose all
those messages (methods) that are sent between two objects i.e. interface
methods.

I am not aware of any way to choose some classes out of a lot for adequate
testing.

Sachin

-----Original Message-----
From: selena su [mailto:selena.su@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 12:54 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Choosing A Right Class.


Hi There:
I believe that, not all the classes we would like to write a test
case or else we will have many test cases. Is there any concept choosing
the correct class to write test cases ?

thanks,
